title: Bacon Avocado Caesar Salad
directions: Slice the lettuce into about 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces, then transfer to a large salad bowl.
Add the bacon, avocado, croutons, cheese, and dressing, mixing until evenly combined.
Serve with additional parmesan on top.
ingredients: ½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g), shaved, add extra for serving
